articles.title: Dale Steyn hits out at Cricket SA after Faf du Plessis, Imran Tahir snubs
articles.description: Former Proteas bowler Dale Steyn was not happy with Cricket South Africa after they slipped up in a congratulations post on Saturday.
articles.content:
Former Proteas bowler Dale Steyn and South African cricket lovers were not happy with Cricket South Africa (CSA) after they slipped up in a congratulations social media post on Saturday.
On Saturday… [+1173 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
